data.name: Flowing Purity
data.passiveDescription: When using an Elemental Skill, All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by {{8//10//12//14//16%}} for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 24% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, every 1,000 HP cleared in the process will provide {{2//2.5//3//3.5//4%}} All Elemental DMG Bonus, up to a maximum of {{12//15//18//21//24%}}. This effect lasts 15s.
